tier.item: (4) Pas nu' pu' wuko-taqa-t kaneelo-t niina `I killed a big male sheep this time.'

(20) Kivàa-pe pùwqe pu' apa-mokyàa-ta-t (put) ki-y aw iikwiw-ta.
Kiva-in sleep then bedding-put:in:bundle-CAUS-PROX it house-ACC to
`After having slept in the kiva, he rolled up his bedding and carried it
on his back to his house.'

He rattlei-draw-PROX then (he iti) DAT feathers-CAUS-CAUS
`After he painted the rattle, he adorned it with feathers.'

(23) Ang nú-nukngwa-t angap-singy-a-t pu' put sòm-ta.
After PL-good-ACC cornhusk:wrapper-peel-CAUS-PROX then it tie-DISTR

tier.item: I gave the money to Po'kaya.
